Sentencas: In this paper, an offline tuning strategy and an online parameter estimation method are exploited to calibrate the solid oxide fuel cell mathematical model.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Different to existing offline tuning strategy, the developed strategy is designed in order to tune the model under various operation conditions.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: First, the particle swarm optimization method combined with the gradient-based search method is applied to tune unknown parameters in the state-space model and the steady-state model for each operation condition.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Then, the sensitive parameters are expanded to the polynomial equations.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Moreover, the reconstructed model including coefficients in the polynomial equations are determined by using the particle swarm optimization method with gradient-based search method for whole operation conditions.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: To show the slowly time-varying performance of a solid oxide fuel cell, an adaptive optimal learning law based on the optimization technology is proposed to online minimize a cost function with the information of the estimation error.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The estimation error is extracted through several low-pass filters and simple algebraic calculation.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Finally, the proposed offline tuning strategy and the developed online adaptive estimation method are verified by conducting experiments on a practical solid oxide fuel cell test bench.(c) 2022 ISA.
Titulo: Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system
Offline and online parameter estimation of nonlinear systems: Application to a solid oxide fuel cell system
